thread.title: Amitabh Bachchan Completes 48 Glorious Years In Bollywood, Shares Nostalgic Pics On His Blog
thread.title_full: Amitabh Bachchan Completes 48 Glorious Years In Bollywood, Shares Nostalgic Pics On His Blog

title: Amitabh Bachchan Completes 48 Glorious Years In Bollywood, Shares Nostalgic Pics On His Blog
text:
facebook 105 SHARES 
The mega-star of Bollywood, Amitabh Bachchan, completes 48 glorious years in the industry today. He started his acting career with the film, Saath Hindustani , and has come a long way in his career. Even today, at the age of 74, he does movies like Pink , that can give any young actor a run for their money. The Deewar actor took to his blog, where he shared several on-set pictures clicked during the shooting of his debut film. His blog reads, "There is an avalanche of events related to this date, the 15th of February... For on this date in the year of the Lord 1969...Yes that is nineteen sixty nine... I became an official entrant to the film industry, by signing my very first film, Saat Hindustani ." 
We are glad that we witnessed this amazing talent in our life time. Congratulations, sir.
